definition: gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi
to smoke/to fumigate/to assail the nostrils/to perfume

sentences.english: That abominable place was so dirty and evil smelling that he turned away in disgust.
sentences.chinese: 這個鬼地方如此骯髒而且臭氣熏天，他厭惡地走開了。

sentences.english: Heavy rain finally saved the day and rid London of its smell.
sentences.chinese: 滂沱大雨挽救了局面，讓倫敦免於臭氣熏天。

sentences.english: A man will wear the same pair of shoes all day.
sentences.chinese: 男人，早晚一雙鞋，不到臭氣熏天不帶換的。

sentences.english: The window was closed and the stink was overpowering.
sentences.chinese: 窗戶關得嚴嚴的，房間裏臭氣熏天。
